options.text: So, are you into the priest or the groom?

text: What?! I don't know what you are talking about!

options.text: It's ok man, I'm no one to judge. Once I was in a pretty tight threesome myself.

text: Thank you, I made it myself.
I wish I was in a threesome... No shit

options.text: So let me guess, you have a crush on the groom?

text: Is it that obvious? Please! Don't say anything.

options.text: I don't think the bride will be too happy about that.
Tell the bride. She would love to hear this.

text: You are right. I can't hold it in any longer
